description: This one-of-a kind intricate handmade Rose Gold bridal bracelet features marquis shape crystal gemstones and petite freshwater pearls in a beautiful natural vine pattern. The organic styling of this stunning hand-wired blush gold wedding accessory gives this Mariell couture bridal bracelet it's runway look. With 6 1/4" of breathtaking meticulously hand-wrought sprays and a 2" adjustable tail this pink gold bracelet is flexible enough to fit almost any size wrist. We guarantee you'll make a stunning bridal statement! Wear this delicate boho style bracelet anytime for an ethereal, romantic and head-turning designer fashion look with nature-inspired beauty.
